{"__html":"<h2 id=\"62e3fc6bee652d711e0fb92a63d77a3b\">邮箱通知接口实现</h2>\n<h3 id=\"698d741a569273f540091f941a3d7508\">请求类型</h3>\n<ul>\n<li>POST</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"6d4a702eb65ec84e46230691dcaa60fc\">请求参数</h3>\n<p><code>Body</code></p>\n<table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>是否必填</th>\n<th>描述</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody><tr>\n<td>sign</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>是</td>\n<td>将request_content、timestamp、nonce按字典排序后RSA签名后的Base64字符串，可忽略</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>request_content</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>是</td>\n<td>回调接口请求体字符串</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>timestamp</td>\n<td>Long</td>\n<td>是</td>\n<td>13位时间戳，可忽略</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>nonce</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>是</td>\n<td>6位随机字符，可忽略</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<p>通过callback回调模块通知，因此 <code>sign</code>、<code>timestamp</code> 、<code>nonce</code>字段可忽略。</p>\n<h3 id=\"3331d89dd7043b782c9cfade76d71354\">验证码通知请求样例</h3>\n<blockquote>\n<p>messageType=VERIFICATION_CODE</p>\n</blockquote>\n<pre><code class=\"language-json\">{\n  &quot;sign&quot;:&quot;&quot;,\n    &quot;request_content&quot;:&quot;{\\&quot;messageType\\&quot;:\\&quot;VERIFICATION_CODE\\&quot;,\\&quot;recipient\\&quot;:\\&quot;xxx@qq.com\\&quot;,\\&quot;sender\\&quot;:\\&quot;xxx@alibaba.com\\&quot;,\\&quot;verificationCode\\&quot;:\\&quot;654519\\&quot;,\\&quot;receivedAt\\&quot;:1622442193460}&quot;,\n    &quot;timestamp&quot;:1620714106666,\n    &quot;nonce&quot;:&quot;d94f38&quot;\n}</code></pre>\n<h3 id=\"c2405bc745a43d79252a43b8c789296a\">错误通知请求样例</h3>\n<blockquote>\n<p>messageType=ERROR</p>\n</blockquote>\n<pre><code class=\"language-json\">{\n  &quot;sign&quot;:&quot;&quot;,\n    &quot;request_content&quot;:&quot;{\\&quot;messageType\\&quot;:\\&quot;ERROR\\&quot;,\\&quot;msg\\&quot;:\\&quot;邮件处理异常，请稍后再试或联系管理员\\&quot;}&quot;,\n    &quot;timestamp&quot;:1620714106666,\n    &quot;nonce&quot;:&quot;d94f38&quot;,\n}</code></pre>\n<h3 id=\"768d716efc778862e2d7793a72d27eb8\">响应成功标志</h3>\n<p>Http Status Code: 200，响应体</p>\n<pre><code class=\"language-json\">{\n    &quot;code&quot;:&quot;000&quot;,\n    ...\n}</code></pre>\n","key":"a8e6fa8e671ffad6ae2eddd2d9972174","fileName":"__open-docs_08-邮箱服务(for易楼)_03-邮件通知接口实现.json","mtimeMs":1625127790000,"birthtimeMs":1625127790000}
